```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```


Derivatives!!!

```{r}
x <- 3
ex1 <- expression(x ^ 2)



a <- 1.2 
ex2 <- expression(2 * (3 * a + 2)^ 4 - 5)

t <- 0
ex3 <- expression((- 4 * t)/(t ^ 2 + 1)^ 3)


# Find derivative of each

D1 <- D(ex1, 'x')
eval(D1)

D2 <- D(ex2, 'a')
eval(D2)

D3 <- D(ex3, 't')
eval(D3)
```
